pages.text: When I heard of a shield made of glass that was actually good at protecting you from attacks, I thought it was some sort of joke.

Surprisingly, the rumors are true. Though, the $(item)Chroma Shard$() present in the item does most of the work. The shield absorbs the blow, and then the pieces re-arrange themselves back together. This is such a strange method that nobody I know actually knows how it works. It's magic.
